fields.name: AdminCredentials
fields.description: The credentials of the administrative interface on this storage appliance.

fields.name: RackSlot
fields.description: The slot that storage appliance is in the rack based on the BOM configuration.

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.description: The serial number of the appliance.

fields.name: StorageApplianceName
fields.description: The user-provided name for the storage appliance that will be created from this specification.
